[2] DECLARE FUNCTION RETURNS(A$)​ LINE INPUT "Enter a Sentence"; S$​ PRINT RETURN$(S$)​ END FUNCTION RETURNS(A$)​ FOR T=1 TO LEN(A$)​ E$= MID$(A$,T,1)​ IF E$ SPACE$(1) THEN​ R$=E$+R$​ END IF​ NEXT T​ RETURN$=R$​ END FUNCTION Questions:
